translated: It is said, “Where there is no appearance.”

original: shes pa rnams cig car kho na skye'o zhes bya ba ji ltar shes shin rim gyis 'dzin pa khas len na rnam par rtog pa med pa'i snang ba mi srid pa kho nar 'gyur te snga ma 'dzin pa ni phyi ma 'dzin pa'i dus na rnam par rtog
analyzed: shes pa rnams cig car kho na skye'o zhes bya ba ji ltar shes shin rim gyis 'dzin pa khas len na rnam par rtog pa med pa'i snang ba mi srid pa kho nar 'gyur te snga ma 'dzin pa ni phyi ma 'dzin pa'i dus na rnam par rtog
translated: If you accept that they are apprehended sequentially, then it is impossible for a nonconceptual appearance to exist, because when the former is apprehended, the latter would definitely be conceptual.

original: pa dang bcas pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pa dang bcas pa kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin mod /
analyzed: thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa yin mod /
translated: You may say, “All consciousnesses are definitely conceptual,🔽but this is exactly what we assert.”

original: kho bo cag gi 'dod pa kho na yin no zhe na bshad pa rtog med nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi 'dod pa kho na yin no zhe na bshad pa rtog med nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: We respond, if they are nonconceptual,

original: don gsal ba'i 'dzin pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
analyzed: don gsal ba'i 'dzin pa mi srid par 'gyur te /
translated: it is impossible to apprehend a clear object.

original: thams cad mi gsal bar snang ba nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽yang ji ltar na dran par rtogs pa la gsal bar snang ba nyid mi 'thad ce na /
analyzed: thams cad mi gsal bar snang ba nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // yang ji ltar na dran par rtogs pa la gsal bar snang ba nyid mi 'thad ce na /
translated: This is the meaning: it would be the apprehension of all things as unclear.🔽How is it that it is not tenable that a clear appearance exists in the realization of memory?

original: sngon po mthong ba'i dngos po sgro btags pa gang yin pa gsal bar snang ba ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngon po mthong ba'i dngos po sgro btags pa gang yin pa gsal bar snang ba ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: How could the clear appearance of the thing that is the superimposition of blue be possible?

original: sgro btags pa gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgro btags pa gsal bar snang ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it contradicts the appearance of the clear image of the superimposition.

original: gzhan gyis smras pa shin tu goms par gyur pa las sgro btags pa yang gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro snyam ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyis smras pa shin tu goms par gyur pa las sgro btags pa yang gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro snyam ni //
translated: Another says: “From the extreme habituation to the superimposition, the clear image of the superimposition arises.”

original: 'di la brjod pa ni sgro btags pa gsal bar snang med ni rtog pa med pa kho na 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni sgro btags pa gsal bar snang med ni rtog pa med pa kho na 'gyur te /
translated: To this we reply: “If the clear image of the superimposition does not arise, then there is no conceptualization at all.

original: gsal bar snang ba ni @187a * //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba ni @187a * //
translated: Because the clear image

original: rtog pa dang bcas par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not tenable as having conceptualization.

original: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni gsal bar snang ba nyid la yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni gsal bar snang ba nyid la yin no //
translated: The so-called suchness is just the clear image.

original: gal te de ltar ni rim gyis skye ba yin yang rnam ba gsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te de ltar ni rim gyis skye ba yin yang rnam ba gsal ba'i phyir /
translated: If that is so, then even though it arises gradually, because of the clear image,

original: rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur mod //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa nyid du 'gyur mod //
translated: it would be nonconceptual.

original: rim gyis skye ba 'gag pa ni mi 'grub po zhe na /
analyzed: rim gyis skye ba 'gag pa ni mi 'grub po zhe na /
translated: If the gradual arising is not established, then the cessation is not established.”

original: de lta yin dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta yin dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: To this we reply: “If that is so, then…”

original: sngon gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: sngon gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Because there is no retention of the previous nature.

original: sngon gyi rang bzhin du 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngon gyi rang bzhin du 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no apprehension of a previous nature.

original: phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa nyid do mtshar ba yang mtshan skye ba yin la de bas chos so //
analyzed: phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa nyid do mtshar ba yang mtshan skye ba yin la de bas chos so //
translated: The variegated butterfly, etc., is also a wonder, and it is a dharma.

original: khro bo zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: khro bo zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The variegated butterfly is a natural wonder, not an artificial one.🔽It is endowed with differentiation, i.e., with a particular arrangement.

original: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa ni so sor byed pa dang ldan pa'o / de la yang zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i phyir ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yang ngo de la ni rin po che'i phung po la'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba dang ldan pa ni so sor byed pa dang ldan pa'o / de la yang zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i phyir ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yang ngo de la ni rin po che'i phung po la'o //
translated: And in that, i.e., in the variegated butterfly, etc., there is a collection of jewels.

original: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yang ngo ;
analyzed: thams cad la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yang ngo ;
translated: In all, i.e., in the variegated butterfly, etc., which are not artificial.

original: / de'i tshe na ni bcad pa dang phug ba la sogs pa'i dus na phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yan lag can gyi rdzas zhig ma yin pa na zhe na /
analyzed: / de'i tshe na ni bcad pa dang phug ba la sogs pa'i dus na phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa la yan lag can gyi rdzas zhig ma yin pa na zhe na /
translated: At that time, i.e., at the time of cutting and piercing, etc., the variegated butterfly, etc., is not a substance which is a whole.

original: lan ni 'di snga kun la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni 'di snga kun la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The answer is: “This was said before.

original: rin po che'i phung po yang ma 'byar ba'i dus na rdzas zhig yin te /
analyzed: rin po che'i phung po yang ma 'byar ba'i dus na rdzas zhig yin te /
translated: When the mass of jewels is not yet separated, it is a substance.

original: des na der yang gcig nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na der yang gcig nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is also one.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni ma 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni ma 'dres pa'o //
translated: “Thus” means unmixed.

original: de la ni zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pa'o //
translated: “In that” refers to the unfabricated variegated butterfly, etc.

original: de'i reg pa rang bzhin gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i reg pa ci 'dra ba sor reg bde yang de 'dra ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i reg pa rang bzhin gcig yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i reg pa ci 'dra ba sor reg bde yang de 'dra ba yin no //
translated: Because its contact is of one nature, the contact of blue is like the contact of the hand.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin gyi khyad par ro //
translated: The difference is like the difference in the divisions of blue, etc.

original: rnam par dbye ba med par khyad par med pa'i reg pa sogs pa gang yin pa de dang lhan cig rgyu ba ni'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba med par khyad par med pa'i reg pa sogs pa gang yin pa de dang lhan cig rgyu ba ni'o //
translated: That which is not different in contact, etc., is that which moves together.

original: gcig ma zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin phye ma leb khra bo la'o //
analyzed: gcig ma zhes bya ba ni bcos ma ma yin phye ma leb khra bo la'o //
translated: “One” refers to the unfabricated variegated butterfly.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma la'o //
translated: “In another” refers to the fabricated.

original: de la gcig tu mngon par zhen pa nyid skyabs su gyur pa yin na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la gcig tu mngon par zhen pa nyid skyabs su gyur pa yin na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is the case that the very adherence to oneness is the refuge,

original: gal te de la gcag tu mngon par zhen pa yod na /
analyzed: gal te de la gcag tu mngon par zhen pa yod na /
translated: then if there is adherence to oneness,🔽it would follow that there would be one part.

original: des na de la yan lag gcig nyid yod pa yin no zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: des na de la yan lag gcig nyid yod pa yin no zhes rnam pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: That is, it would have that kind of nature.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni gcig tu mngon par zhes pa mtshan nyid kyi skabs so //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni gcig tu mngon par zhes pa mtshan nyid kyi skabs so //
translated: That is, the adherence to oneness.

original: des na ji ltar der yan lag cag med kyang gcig tu mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du bcos ma ma yin pa @187b rnams la yang 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na ji ltar der yan lag cag med kyang gcig tu mngon par zhen pa de bzhin du bcos ma ma yin pa @187b rnams la yang 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, just as there is no part in that, and yet there is adherence to oneness, so it is in the case of the unfabricated.

original: gal te yan lag cag gcig med na /
analyzed: gal te yan lag cag gcig med na /
translated: If there is no part,

original: de'i tshe gcig drangs na thams cad 'ongs pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe gcig drangs na thams cad 'ongs pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can it be that when one is brought, all are brought?

original: gcig drangs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gcig drangs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: One is brought.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni kha long dang lcags dag la'o //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni kha long dang lcags dag la'o //
translated: There also refers to the mouth and the iron.

original: bcos ma'i dngos po rnams la yod pa'i yon tan sngon po la sogs pa gang yin pa de gang gi dmigs pa ni rim gyis kho nar 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: bcos ma'i dngos po rnams la yod pa'i yon tan sngon po la sogs pa gang yin pa de gang gi dmigs pa ni rim gyis kho nar 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: The qualities of blue, etc., that exist in artificial things are the objects of cognition that occur only gradually.

original: de las gzhan bcos ma ma yin rnams la ni'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan bcos ma ma yin rnams la ni'o //
translated: But those that are not artificial are otherwise.

original: blo gcig ni zhes bya ba bcos bu'i yul can no //
analyzed: blo gcig ni zhes bya ba bcos bu'i yul can no //
translated: “ One cognition” refers to the one that has an artificial object.

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i yul can no //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i yul can no //
translated: “ Another” refers to the one that has a non-artificial object.

original: gcig dang du ma'i rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i sna tshogs kyang gcig kho na yin la /
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ni bcos bu ma yin pa'i sna tshogs kyang gcig kho na yin la /
translated: “ The distinction between one and many” means that even the various non-artificial things are only one,

original: bcom bu'i ni du ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: bcom bu'i ni du ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam pa'o //
translated: but the artificial things are many.

original: de'i ngo bor rnam par 'jog pa la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i ngo bor rnam par 'jog pa la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ In the determination of their nature” means

original: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa la'o //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa la'o //
translated: in the determination of their nature as one or many.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba gcig dang du ma'i dang bzhin rnam par 'jog pa la rtsom pa gegs med pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba gcig dang du ma'i dang bzhin rnam par 'jog pa la rtsom pa gegs med pa ste /
translated: “ In this way” means that the beginning of the determination of their nature as one or many is unobstructed.

original: gegs dang bral ba'i rtsom pa gang la yod pa'i blo de dag kyang ste /
analyzed: gegs dang bral ba'i rtsom pa gang la yod pa'i blo de dag kyang ste /
translated: The cognition that has the composition free from obstruction, and

original: gcig dang du ma snang ba dang ldan pa dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma snang ba dang ldan pa dag kyang ngo //
translated: that has the appearance of one and many,

original: gcig tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa chos mthun pa tsam de nyid kyis rgyu mtshan des nye bar btags pa'i tshad ma gang la yod kyi blo gzhan des so //
analyzed: gcig tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa chos mthun pa tsam de nyid kyis rgyu mtshan des nye bar btags pa'i tshad ma gang la yod kyi blo gzhan des so //
translated: by that very mere similarity of the property of being conceived as one, etc., the valid cognition that is designated by that reason exists in the other cognition.

original: byed na de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
analyzed: byed na de'i tshe zhes khong nas phyung la /
translated: If it were to function, then at that time,🔽having extracted from within,

original: chos mthun pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyar ro //
analyzed: chos mthun pa 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa sbyar ro //
translated: one should apply “this similarity of the property” and so on.

original: 'di nyid tshig le 'ur byas pa gnyis kyis sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid tshig le 'ur byas pa gnyis kyis sdud pa ni de'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This very [verse] is summarized in two verses, therefore.🔽The cognition that is established in relation to the various natures of objects, those cognitions, from other appearances,

original: don rang bzhin sna tshogs pa dang 'brel pa grub pa'i blo de dag ni snang ba gzhan dag las ni zhes bya ba mngon bar snang ba'i khyad par gcig las snang ba gzhan sor bo'i rang bzhin can don med ces bya bar brjod pa ste /
analyzed: don rang bzhin sna tshogs pa dang 'brel pa grub pa'i blo de dag ni snang ba gzhan dag las ni zhes bya ba mngon bar snang ba'i khyad par gcig las snang ba gzhan sor bo'i rang bzhin can don med ces bya bar brjod pa ste /
translated: the difference in manifest appearance, from one appearance, the nature of the rest is said to be meaningless.

original: snang ba gang la don sna tshogs pa yod pa de ni med do du ma yod pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba gang la don sna tshogs pa yod pa de ni med do du ma yod pa'o //
translated: The object of any appearance that has various objects does not exist.

original: de'i dngos po ni don med de don tha dad pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni don med de don tha dad pa can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its entity is meaningless, i.e., it has no different objects.

original: 'on te gcig tu mngon bar zhen pa yod pa'i phyir na de 'dra ba'i blo yod pa dag la yang /
analyzed: 'on te gcig tu mngon bar zhen pa yod pa'i phyir na de 'dra ba'i blo yod pa dag la yang /
translated: But if there is a cognition of that kind in regard to what is conceived as one,

original: gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gcig nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: it is one.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If, it is said.

original: de zhes bya ba ni chos mtshungs pa tsam mo //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni chos mtshungs pa tsam mo //
translated: That is, it is merely a similarity of attributes.

original: 'gar yang min zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gar yang min zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not anywhere,

original: gcig la chos mthun pa tsam gyis mi 'grub ba na thams cad la mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: gcig la chos mthun pa tsam gyis mi 'grub ba na thams cad la mi 'grub ste /
translated: because it is not established by mere similarity of attributes in one, it is not established in all,

original: chos mtshungs pa tsam ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽'gal @188a * //
analyzed: chos mtshungs pa tsam ni thun mong yin pa'i phyir ro // 'gal @188a * //
translated: because mere similarity of attributes is common to all.🔽With its opposite, i.e., with what has a contrary attribute,

original: zla dang ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'brel pa de 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: zla dang ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'brel pa de 'dzin pas so //
translated: because it is connected with the apprehension of that.

original: stobs mtshungs pa'am mi mtshungs pa zhig sel grang na /
analyzed: stobs mtshungs pa'am mi mtshungs pa zhig sel grang na /
translated: If it is a counter-correlate, i.e., if it is a counter-correlate that is equal in strength or not equal in strength,

original: dang po la brjod ba ni stobs mtshungs pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dang po la brjod ba ni stobs mtshungs pa nyid yin na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The first is stated in the line, “If they are equal in strength.

original: gnyis pa la brjod pa ni stobs mi mtshungs na yang zhes gsungs so ;🔽/ sel bar byed pa gang yin ba da ltos te /
analyzed: gnyis pa la brjod pa ni stobs mi mtshungs na yang zhes gsungs so ; / sel bar byed pa gang yin ba da ltos te /
translated: ” The second is stated in the line, “If they are not equal in strength.

original: stobs mi mtshungs pa nyid yin na yang ji ltar tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: stobs mi mtshungs pa nyid yin na yang ji ltar tshad ma yin te /
translated: ” The question is, “If they are not equal in strength, how can they be valid cognitions?

original: des tshad ma ni sel ba mi srid do zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des tshad ma ni sel ba mi srid do zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: ” The idea is that it is impossible for a valid cognition to be overridden.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: “ But” introduces an objection.

original: lan ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gang zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: The response is, “If it is.

original: des na zhes bya ba ni don med na mi 'byung bas na'o //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni don med na mi 'byung bas na'o //
translated: ” “ Therefore” means because it is impossible for it to occur without an object.

original: de nyid ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: That is the inference.

original: gzhal bya'o zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i'o //
analyzed: gzhal bya'o zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i'o //
translated: “ The object” is a different thing.

original: rgyu nyes pas gzhal bya gzhan la blo rnam pa gzhan du yang skye'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa kho na yin na /
analyzed: rgyu nyes pas gzhal bya gzhan la blo rnam pa gzhan du yang skye'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa kho na yin na /
translated: It is only logical to say that the mind arises in a different way with regard to a different object because of a defect in the cause.

original: shes pa yongs su gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni //
analyzed: shes pa yongs su gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni //
translated: But in the case of a cognition that is by nature completely clear,

original: rgyu'i rkyen skyob brgya phrag gis kyang blo rnam pa gzhan du ji ltar 'thad de /
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen skyob brgya phrag gis kyang blo rnam pa gzhan du ji ltar 'thad de /
translated: How could the mind be turned to another object by hundreds of causes?

original: mi 'thad pa kho na'o //🔽rim pa dang ldan pa'i snang ba'i rang gi ngo bo bcos ma'i phye ma leb khro bo la sogs pa dag la ni //
analyzed: mi 'thad pa kho na'o // rim pa dang ldan pa'i snang ba'i rang gi ngo bo bcos ma'i phye ma leb khro bo la sogs pa dag la ni //
translated: It is not possible.

original: rim pa med par 'gyur ro zhes mi rigs so //
analyzed: rim pa med par 'gyur ro zhes mi rigs so //
translated: In the case of the angry man, etc., the nature of the appearance is fabricated, and it is not reasonable to say that it is not gradual.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rang bzhin gcig la ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig la ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the single nature.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni du ma nyid du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni du ma nyid du'o //
translated: Thus means in the case of multiplicity.

original: gal te snang ba 'di rang bzhin du ma nyid yin pa de lta na yang gcig ces bya ba khyed gcig nyid mngon par 'dod pa ni du ma nyid du snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa'o //
analyzed: gal te snang ba 'di rang bzhin du ma nyid yin pa de lta na yang gcig ces bya ba khyed gcig nyid mngon par 'dod pa ni du ma nyid du snang ba yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi rtsod pa'o //
translated: Even if this appearance is of a multiple nature, still, the one that you assert is a single entity appears as multiple. This is the opponent’s objection.

original: 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The refutation is “No, because . . .

original: gal te rim ma yin pa ni snang na de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: gal te rim ma yin pa ni snang na de'i tshe rang gi ngo bo nyid ma yin no zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: If the appearance is not gradual, then it is not a nature.”

original: de la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pas so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni bcos ma'i phye ma leb khra bo la sogs pas so //
translated: The it refers to the variegated artificial butterfly, etc.

original: rim pa yang snang ba'am ma yin /
analyzed: rim pa yang snang ba'am ma yin /
translated: The order is not apparent.

original: gal te re zhig mi snang pa 'khrul pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te re zhig mi snang pa 'khrul pa yin na /
translated: If, on the one hand, the non-appearance is the error,

original: de'i tshad dngos po thams cad la gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na 'khrul par 'gyur ba bzlog pa med do //
analyzed: de'i tshad dngos po thams cad la gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs na 'khrul par 'gyur ba bzlog pa med do //
translated: then, in that case, the measure of it would be the error in the state of sleep with regard to all things, and there would be no avoiding it.

original: phyogs dang po la brjod pa ni de ltar de nyid ces bya ba ste rim pa'i rang bzhin nyid du'o //
analyzed: phyogs dang po la brjod pa ni de ltar de nyid ces bya ba ste rim pa'i rang bzhin nyid du'o //
translated: As for the first position, he says, In that way, that, i.e., in the nature of the order.

original: rnam pa gzhan du yang rnam par brtag par byas nas sum 'byin pa ni gal te gzhan snang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du yang rnam par brtag par byas nas sum 'byin pa ni gal te gzhan snang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Otherwise, having imagined it in another way, he presents the third alternative: If it is the appearance of another, etc.

original: gal te tshul gzhan gang yin snang nyid brjod par 'dod pa'i tshul la 'khrul bar brjod na /
analyzed: gal te tshul gzhan gang yin snang nyid brjod par 'dod pa'i tshul la 'khrul bar brjod na /
translated: If it is said that the error is in the appearance of a mode that is other than the one that is intended,

original: de'i tshe brjod par 'dod pa de'i rang gi ngo bo snang bar ji ltar @188b 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe brjod par 'dod pa de'i rang gi ngo bo snang bar ji ltar @188b 'gyur /
translated: then, in that case, how could the appearance of the intrinsic reality of that which is intended occur?

original: rang gi ngo bo mi snang na yang ba de med pas ji ltar 'khrul //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo mi snang na yang ba de med pas ji ltar 'khrul //
translated: And if the intrinsic reality does not appear, then, because it does not exist, how could there be an error?

original: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation is “If, etc. ”

original: de'i ni brjod par 'dod pa'i'o //
analyzed: de'i ni brjod par 'dod pa'i'o //
translated: “That” refers to the one who desires to speak.

original: 'on te brjod par 'dod pa'i snang ba yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te brjod par 'dod pa'i snang ba yod pa nyid do //
translated: “But” means that the appearance of what is desired to be spoken is not nonexistent.

original: 'on kyang ma dmigs pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on kyang ma dmigs pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that it is not perceived,

original: gal te mi snang na yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te mi snang na yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Even if it does not appear, etc. ”

original: 'khrul ba yang brjod par bya ba ste blo gzhan snang ba la yang blo thams cad yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul ba yang brjod par bya ba ste blo gzhan snang ba la yang blo thams cad yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Error” is to be stated, because all cognitions exist in the appearance of another cognition.

original: de zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa'i tshul gyi yul can no //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa'i tshul gyi yul can no //
translated: “That” refers to the subject that is the mode of what is desired to be spoken.

original: de zhes bya ba ni rim pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni rim pa yin pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the order.

original: gzhan du snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim ma yin pa'i yul dag la rim pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du snang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rim ma yin pa'i yul dag la rim pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because of the appearance of another” means that the order of the objects appears as if it were the order.

original: rim pa'i blo nyid 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa'i blo nyid 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: The thought is that the cognition of the order would be erroneous.

original: 'on ta ti la la sogs pa yang rim pa yin par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'on ta ti la la sogs pa yang rim pa yin par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If even “ta” and so on are not the order,

original: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then the statement is “In that case, etc. ”

original: gal te rim ma yin pa zhes bya ba dngos po nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te rim ma yin pa zhes bya ba dngos po nyid yin na /
translated: If non-sequential were a thing,

original: de'i tshe blo'i rang bzhin yang rim yin par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe blo'i rang bzhin yang rim yin par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
translated: then at that time the nature of cognition would not be sequential.

original: 'on kyang rim pa dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang rim pa dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: But rather, it would be sequential alone,

original: rim ma yin pa ni 'gar yang mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim ma yin pa ni 'gar yang mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because non-sequential is never possible.

original: de ltan yul yang rim pa dang bcas pa yin la blo yang de bzhin du yin pas na 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltan yul yang rim pa dang bcas pa yin la blo yang de bzhin du yin pas na 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the object also has sequence, and cognition is the same, so there would be no error.

original: gal te dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo'i blo gang yin pa de la /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo'i blo gang yin pa de la /
translated: If the cognition of the intrinsic nature of a thing

original: blo gzhan 'dzin par byed pa yin na ste /
analyzed: blo gzhan 'dzin par byed pa yin na ste /
translated: is apprehended by another cognition,

original: dngos po 'dzin par byed pa'i blo ni rim can gyi rang bzhin la rim ma yin par 'dzin par byed pa'i blo gzhan 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos po 'dzin par byed pa'i blo ni rim can gyi rang bzhin la rim ma yin par 'dzin par byed pa'i blo gzhan 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that the cognition that apprehends the thing arises as a cognition that apprehends the sequential nature non-sequentially.

original: blo gzhan de yang rim can gyi dngos por blo 'dzin par byed pa yin na ste /
analyzed: blo gzhan de yang rim can gyi dngos por blo 'dzin par byed pa yin na ste /
translated: And if that other cognition apprehends the cognition of sequential things,

original: rim par 'dzin par byed pa'i ngo bo de yang ji ltar rim pa ma yin par snang bar 'thad bar 'gyur /
analyzed: rim par 'dzin par byed pa'i ngo bo de yang ji ltar rim pa ma yin par snang bar 'thad bar 'gyur /
translated: Also, how could that nature which is the apprehender of sequence appear in a nonsequential way?

original: 'di ni ma 'khrul ba'i phyogs brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni ma 'khrul ba'i phyogs brjod pa yin la /
translated: This is the statement of the unmistaken position.

original: 'khrul ba'i phyogs la ni gnod byed mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i phyogs la ni gnod byed mdun du 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The refutation of the mistaken position will be explained later.

original: yang na gal te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo las de bzhin du blo gzhan skye ba yin na /
analyzed: yang na gal te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo las de bzhin du blo gzhan skye ba yin na /
translated: Moreover, if a mind that is the object of an entity arises in that way from another mind,

original: de'i tshe rim 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba rim pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni rim ma yin par snang bar mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de'i tshe rim 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ni zhes bya ba rim pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni rim ma yin par snang bar mi 'thad de /
translated: then at that time, the nature that is the apprehender of sequence, that is, the nature that is the apprehender of an entity that possesses sequence, would not be tenable as appearing in a nonsequential way.

original: blo gzhan nyid rim ma yin par snang mod dngos po'i yul can rim pa dang ldan pa'i blo go ji ltar rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: blo gzhan nyid rim ma yin par snang mod dngos po'i yul can rim pa dang ldan pa'i blo go ji ltar rim ma yin par snang bar 'gyur //
translated: Although another mind itself appears in a nonsequential way, how could a mind that is the object of an entity, which possesses sequence, appear in a nonsequential way?

original: des na dngos po rnams kyi rim pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na dngos po rnams kyi rim pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore the sequence of entities would not exist because

original: de'i blo'i rim pa dang bcas pa kho @189a * //🔽nar snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i blo'i rim pa dang bcas pa kho @189a * //🔽nar snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: only the sequence of that mind would appear.

original: blo'i snang ba ji lta ba bzhin yul rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo'i snang ba ji lta ba bzhin yul rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object is posited in accordance with the appearance to cognition.

original: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is being commented on by “If it were so. . .

original: de 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni nor bu dang mu tig la sogs par 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni nor bu dang mu tig la sogs par 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: ” “The cognition of that” is the cognition of a jewel, a pearl, and so on.

original: gal te blo rim ma yin par snang na dngos po yang de bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te blo rim ma yin par snang na dngos po yang de bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the cognition does not appear in sequence, then the object also would not appear in sequence.

original: blo 'dzin par byed pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: blo 'dzin par byed pa yang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The cognition of the cognition” is the cognition of the cognition of a jewel, a pearl, and so on.

original: blo'i blo gang zhig gzhal bya la rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jug pa de'i snang ba'i dbang gis ji ltar gzhal bya de'i rang bzhin du tha snyad byed ces bsams ba'o //
analyzed: blo'i blo gang zhig gzhal bya la rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jug pa de'i snang ba'i dbang gis ji ltar gzhal bya de'i rang bzhin du tha snyad byed ces bsams ba'o //
translated: What is the point of this? It is this. The object is designated as having the nature of that object by the power of the appearance of the cognition that does not engage in any way with the object to be cognized.🔽“If the cognition does not appear in sequence. . .

original: rim ma yin par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: rim ma yin par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
translated: ” and so on.

original: bshad pa dang po gnod byed gzhan brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa dang po gnod byed gzhan brjod pa'o //
translated: This is the first explanation, which states the other refutation.

original: gal te dngos po'i blo rim can kho na yin na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po'i blo rim can kho na yin na /
translated: If the cognition of the object is sequential,

original: de'i tshe de blo'i blo la yang rim ma yin par snang ba'i phyir mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe de blo'i blo la yang rim ma yin par snang ba'i phyir mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: At that time, it is not tenable that it appears to the mind of the mind in a nonsequential way. This is the meaning of the above.

original: gal te 'khrul pas rim ma yin pa de blo'i blo la snang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'khrul pas rim ma yin pa de blo'i blo la snang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the nonsequential appearance is due to error,

original: de'i tshe sngar bshad pa de nyid de /
analyzed: de'i tshe sngar bshad pa de nyid de /
translated: then the same point that was explained earlier applies.

original: 'khrul med yin par thal te rang gi ngo bor 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul med yin par thal te rang gi ngo bor 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It follows that it is not erroneous because it is apprehended as its own nature.🔽Just as the mind of the mind apprehends it in a nonsequential way, the object of comprehension of the mind of the thing is apprehended in that way. By what means is it prevented from being a nature that is nonsequential?🔽The object of comprehension is also apprehended as only nonsequential.

original: ji ltar blo'i blos rim min par 'dzin pa de bzhin du dngos po'i blo de'i gzhal bya 'dzin pa de de ltar de rim ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du yin pa gang gis bzlog / gzhal bya yang rim ma yin pa kho nar 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: ji ltar blo'i blos rim min par 'dzin pa de bzhin du dngos po'i blo de'i gzhal bya 'dzin pa de de ltar de rim ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du yin pa gang gis bzlog / gzhal bya yang rim ma yin pa kho nar 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes
translated: This is the thought.

original: dgongs pa'o // tshig le'ur byas pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dgongs pa'o // tshig le'ur byas pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the verses,

original: re zhig sngar bshad zin pa nyid brjod pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig sngar bshad zin pa nyid brjod pa ni /
translated: he states what was already explained earlier.

original: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “If” is the first.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rim rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni rim rang bzhin du'o //
translated: “In that way” is in a sequential nature.

original: gcig gis ni blo'i blos so //
analyzed: gcig gis ni blo'i blos so //
translated: “By one” is by the mind of the mind.

original: dngos po'i yul can gyi blo'i rang bzhin du mi 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can gyi blo'i rang bzhin du mi 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: It follows that it is not apprehended as the nature of a cognition that has a real object.

original: 'on te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo ni rang bzhin du mi 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: 'on te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo ni rang bzhin du mi 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: Or else, it follows that a cognition that has a real object is not apprehended as a nature.

original: 'on te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo ni rang bzhin gcig nyid du blo'i blos rtogs pa des na /
analyzed: 'on te dngos po'i yul can gyi blo ni rang bzhin gcig nyid du blo'i blos rtogs pa des na /
translated: If you say that the cognition that has a real object is realized by the cognition that is the nature to be a single nature,

original: du ma 'dzin par ji ltar thal snyam na /
analyzed: du ma 'dzin par ji ltar thal snyam na /
translated: then how could it follow that it is apprehended as multiple?

original: snga ma dang zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: snga ma dang zhes gsungs so //
translated: The response to this is, “The former . . .”

original: dngos po'i yul can snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'dzin pa dag la ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'dzin pa dag la ni //
translated: The apprehension of the former and the latter that have real objects

original: gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: is not a single entity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gcig nyid du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid du rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not realized to be a single entity.

original: rang gi ngo bos gcig nyid ma yin mod /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos gcig nyid ma yin mod /
translated: It is not a single entity by virtue of its own nature.

original: de lta na yang blo phyi mas gcig nyid rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rtsod ba la lan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de lta na yang blo phyi mas gcig nyid rtog pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rtsod ba la lan brjod pa ni /
translated: Even so, the response to the argument that the later cognition conceives it to be a single entity is as follows.

original: rim pa dang ldan pa de yang zhes bya ba ste blo phyi ma'o //
analyzed: rim pa dang ldan pa de yang zhes bya ba ste blo phyi ma'o //
translated: “That which is endowed with a sequence” is the later cognition.

original: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa snga ma dang phyi ma rnams so //
analyzed: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa snga ma dang phyi ma rnams so //
translated: “Unitarily” means the prior and subsequent apprehensions.

original: gal te rim pa dang ldan pa yin na de ltan yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'dzin pa @189b thams cad de ltar snang ba des na /
analyzed: gal te rim pa dang ldan pa yin na de ltan yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i 'dzin pa @189b thams cad de ltar snang ba des na /
translated: If it is sequential, then the prior and subsequent apprehensions would all be cognized as such.

original: gcig nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gcig nyid du rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it would be cognized as unitary.

original: 'dzin par byed pa rim pa dang ldan pa blo phyi ma'i mtshams nyid gang yin pa de'i dus las 'da' ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa rim pa dang ldan pa blo phyi ma'i mtshams nyid gang yin pa de'i dus las 'da' ba ma yin no //
translated: The apprehender is sequential, and the subsequent cognition does not go beyond the time of the prior cognition.

original: 'dzin pa thams cad kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin pa thams cad kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin te /
translated: All apprehensions have different characteristics.

original: des na gcig nyid gang gis rtogs pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na gcig nyid gang gis rtogs pa zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is intended that it is cognized as unitary.

original: 'di ni zhes dbye ba ni blo phyi ma'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes dbye ba ni blo phyi ma'o //
translated: “This” refers to the subsequent cognition.

original: rim med pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: rim med pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni //
translated: “Non-sequential” means

original: de ni blo gcig sgrib pa de la zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni blo gcig sgrib pa de la zhes bya ba'o //
translated: that one cognition is obscured with respect to that.

original: dbang pos song nas don gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin ta //
analyzed: dbang pos song nas don gzung bar bya ba ni ma yin ta //
translated: It is not that the object is apprehended after the sense faculty has gone.

original: 'on kyang 'dug bzhin du'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dug bzhin du'o //
translated: Rather, it is while remaining.

original: de'i tshe bsgribs pa la yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe bsgribs pa la yang 'gyur te /
translated: At that time, there would be obscuration.

original: bsgribs pa dang mi bsgribs pa dag la dbang po mi 'gro bar khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgribs pa dang mi bsgribs pa dag la dbang po mi 'gro bar khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference between the covered and uncovered in that the sense faculty does not go to them.

original: gzhan rang gi phyogs la sgrib pa 'thad par ston pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan rang gi phyogs la sgrib pa 'thad par ston pa ni //
translated: The opponent’s position that it is tenable that the sense faculty is obstructed in its own direction is stated:

original: phrad nas zhes bya gsungs so //
analyzed: phrad nas zhes bya gsungs so //
translated: “It is said that the sense faculty contacts its object field.”

original: dbang po ni sgrib pa la thogs pa'i phyir phyir na /
analyzed: dbang po ni sgrib pa la thogs pa'i phyir phyir na /
translated: The sense faculty is obstructed by the obstruction because

original: sgrib pa las brgyal nas 'gro bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrib pa las brgyal nas 'gro bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is unable to go beyond the obstruction.

original: gal te dbang po ma song ba bzhin du 'dzin na ni /
analyzed: gal te dbang po ma song ba bzhin du 'dzin na ni /
translated: If it apprehends like the sense faculty that has not gone,

original: de'i tshe ji ltar nye bar 'dzin pa bzhin du chod pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe ji ltar nye bar 'dzin pa bzhin du chod pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur te /
translated: then at that time, just as it apprehends the near, it would also apprehend the obstructed,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there is no difference. This is the meaning.

original: rang gi phyogs la nyes pa med par brjod pa ni //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la nyes pa med par brjod pa ni //
translated: The statement that there is no fault in our own position is:

original: shin tu thag ring por yang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu thag ring por yang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: “Because it does not go to a very distant place,

original: nyams pa 'thad pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: nyams pa 'thad pa yin no zhes 'brel to //
translated: it is tenable that it is obstructed.”

original: 'di thams cad sun 'byin pa ni /
analyzed: 'di thams cad sun 'byin pa ni /
translated: The refutation of all of this is:

original: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “That is not so.”

original: rung ba la ltos pa'i phyir sgrib pa yod na nyams par 'thad do zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rung ba la ltos pa'i phyir sgrib pa yod na nyams par 'thad do zhes sbyar ro //
translated: Since it depends on the suitable, it is tenable that there is a degeneration if there is an obscuration.

original: dpe nyid 'chad pa ni khab long ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpe nyid 'chad pa ni khab long ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The explanation of the example is “a magnet.”

original: thams cad ces bya ba ni dpag tshad dang rkyang grags na gnas pa rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba ni dpag tshad dang rkyang grags na gnas pa rnams kyang ngo //
translated: “All” means those that are located at a distance of a yojana or more.

original: 'on te de la yang zhes bya ba ni khab long la yang ngo //
analyzed: 'on te de la yang zhes bya ba ni khab long la yang ngo //
translated: “Or even there” means even in the magnet.

original: lcags dang khab long reg pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: lcags dang khab long reg pa yod pa'o //
translated: Iron and the magnet are in contact.

original: ci ste ma mthong snyam na phra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci ste ma mthong snyam na phra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you think that is not seen, it is because of its subtlety.

original: grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa ni 'di skad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' brjod pa ni 'di skad ces bya ba'o //
translated: The statement of the conclusion is “It is like this.”

original: mig gi 'od zer med pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi 'od zer med pa nyid do //
translated: There is no light ray of the eye.

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pas so //🔽de nyid ces bya ba ni mig gi 'od zer gyis reg pa nyid do//
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pas so // de nyid ces bya ba ni mig gi 'od zer gyis reg pa nyid do//
translated: “Others” refers to the Buddhists.🔽“That itself” refers to the contact of the light ray of the eye.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni mig phrad nas 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do// shin tu yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni mig phrad nas 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do// shin tu yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “This” refers to the characteristic of apprehending through contact with the eye.

original: shin tu yang chad pa gzhan gyis zhes bya ba dang / shin tu yang tshogs chen por brtags ba zhes bya ba dang / shin tu yang bzhad gad nyid du 'gyur ro zhes gsum ka la 'brel te //🔽yang dag rig pa ni dam @190a * //
analyzed: shin tu yang chad pa gzhan gyis zhes bya ba dang / shin tu yang tshogs chen por brtags ba zhes bya ba dang / shin tu yang bzhad gad nyid du 'gyur ro zhes gsum ka la 'brel te // yang dag rig pa ni dam @190a * //
translated: And it would be even more of a fallacy for others, and it would be even more of a fallacy for a great assembly, and it would be even more of a fallacy for laughter are all related.

original: bcas pa'i don sgrub pa'i ched du 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bcas pa'i don sgrub pa'i ched du 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The correct knowledge is not engaged for the purpose of accomplishing the meaning of the vow,

original: dam bcas ba'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam bcas ba'i don sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: because it does not accomplish the meaning of the vow, is what it means.

original: 'dren par mthong ba ni skam ba dang lcags sgom la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dren par mthong ba ni skam ba dang lcags sgom la sogs pa la'o //
translated: Seeing as a leader is in the case of a ferryman, a blacksmith, and so on.

original: sngags kyi bden pa la 'gyur mod nyes ba ci yod snyam na /
analyzed: sngags kyi bden pa la 'gyur mod nyes ba ci yod snyam na /
translated: If the truth of the mantra is so, what is the fault?

original: des 'gugs pa ste sngags kyi 'bras bu la sogs pa 'gugs pa la yang sngags dang reg par thal bas na 'dren pa la thal ches par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des 'gugs pa ste sngags kyi 'bras bu la sogs pa 'gugs pa la yang sngags dang reg par thal bas na 'dren pa la thal ches par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even in the case of summoning, the result of the mantra, and so on, the mantra would be in contact, so it is too much to say it leads.

original: der yang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis drangs ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: der yang zhes bya ba ni sngags kyis drangs ba la yang ngo //
translated: Even there means even in the case of being led by the mantra.

original: sngags dang reg par gyur pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: sngags dang reg par gyur pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: If you say it is just in contact with the mantra,

original: 'di la lan btab pa ni sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la lan btab pa ni sgra ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer to this is as follows:🔽Sound is not a real entity, because it is a quality of the elements.

original: yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The response to this is: “Sound is not a quality of space, because it is a quality.”

original: nam mkha'i yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i yon tan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is a quality of space.

original: reg pa ni khyed kyi ltar na ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo yin na /
analyzed: reg pa ni khyed kyi ltar na ldan pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo yin na /
translated: If contact is the essence of a quality that has the characteristic of inherence,

original: de go yon tan sgra la ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de go yon tan sgra la ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: then how could it be a quality of sound?

original: yon tan ni yon tan med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //🔽'di nyid ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba mtshan nyid kyi chos sbyor na ste /
analyzed: yon tan ni yon tan med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o // 'di nyid ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba mtshan nyid kyi chos sbyor na ste /
translated: Because a quality is not a quality.🔽This is the idea.

original: khas len na de'i tshe 'gar yang ma nges par yod par mi 'gyur ro //🔽yin na de'i tshe ci'i phyir /
analyzed: khas len na de'i tshe 'gar yang ma nges par yod par mi 'gyur ro // yin na de'i tshe ci'i phyir /
translated: If one applies the property to be established, the characteristic, then when one accepts it, it is never the case that it is not ascertained.

original: dpag tshad la sogs par shin tu thag ring po na gnas pa mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: dpag tshad la sogs par shin tu thag ring po na gnas pa mi mthong ngo //
translated: If it is, then why is it that one does not see it at a great distance, such as a yojana?

original: de la ni bar na 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir na thogs par byed pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de la ni bar na 'ga' yang med pa'i phyir na thogs par byed pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Because there is nothing between them, there is no obstruction.

original: des na mthong na bzlog par dka'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: des na mthong na bzlog par dka'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, when it is seen, it is difficult to turn away from it. This is the idea.

original: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa ni //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis smras pa ni //
translated: Here, the opponent’s position is stated:

original: mar me'i 'od bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mar me'i 'od bzhin du zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “Like the light of a lamp.”

original: mar me'i 'od ma chod pa reg par byed pa bzhin du mig gi 'od kho na dus su ma khyab na /
analyzed: mar me'i 'od ma chod pa reg par byed pa bzhin du mig gi 'od kho na dus su ma khyab na /
translated: Just as the light of a lamp, which is not obstructed, touches the object, so too the light of the eye, if it does not pervade the object, does not touch it.

original: rnam par gnas pa ma yin no //🔽'o na snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin gyi blo thams cad de la snang ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa ma yin no // 'o na snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin gyi blo thams cad de la snang ba'i phyir na /
translated: If it does not touch the object, it does not illuminate it.🔽If it does not illuminate it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.

original: gcig nyid du rtogs pa 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsams pa'o //🔽lan ni de lta yin na blo phyi ma gcig gis blo snga ma'i rang bzhin de yang du ma nyid kyis na ci nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig nyid du rtogs pa 'thad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi bsams pa'o // lan ni de lta yin na blo phyi ma gcig gis blo snga ma'i rang bzhin de yang du ma nyid kyis na ci nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.

original: blo'i rang bzhin du'o //🔽rang gi gzhung nyid ston pa ni rigs mi mthun rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin du'o // rang gi gzhung nyid ston pa ni rigs mi mthun rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i rnal ma rnams kyi ldan pa gang yin pa nges bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i rnal ma rnams kyi ldan pa gang yin pa nges bskyed pa'o //
translated: If it does not see it, it does not contact it.🔽If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does not see it, it does not contact it.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni ring mo'i yul can no //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni ring mo'i yul can no //
translated: If it does not contact it, it does not see it.🔽If it does

original: lan ni de tshe yang zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni de tshe yang zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The answer is “Even then, ” etc.

original: 'khrul pa'i tshe yang ngo //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i tshe yang ngo //
translated: Even when there is error.

original: 'on te bden pa ma yin pa 'khrul pa'i shes pa la snang ba ni dum yang 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bden pa ma yin pa 'khrul pa'i shes pa la snang ba ni dum yang 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is a false, erroneous cognition that appears, then it is apprehended as well.

original: bden min zhes @190b gsungs so //
analyzed: bden min zhes @190b gsungs so //
translated: “ False” is stated.

original: rang bzhin de ni zhes bya ba na /
analyzed: rang bzhin de ni zhes bya ba na /
translated: “ That nature” refers to

original: ri mo'i yul can gyi blo de la snang ba gang yin pa'i rim mo'o //
analyzed: ri mo'i yul can gyi blo de la snang ba gang yin pa'i rim mo'o //
translated: the lines that appear to the mind that perceives the picture.

original: de ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhes bya ba ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: “ How can that” means it cannot.

original: mi bden pa rang bzhin ni bden pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi bden pa rang bzhin ni bden pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur bar 'thad pa ma yin no //
translated: A false nature cannot be tenable as having the nature of truth.

original: mi bden pa yang pha rol po rang nyid kyis khas blangs pa yin te rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes par khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //🔽gal te blo gcig kho na la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig ni bden la /
analyzed: mi bden pa yang pha rol po rang nyid kyis khas blangs pa yin te rnam pa dang bcas pa'i shes par khas mi len pa'i phyir ro // gal te blo gcig kho na la rang bzhin 'ga' zhig ni bden la /
translated: Moreover, the opponent himself accepts that it is false, because he does not accept that it has aspects.

original: rang bzhin 'ga' zhig ni mi bden pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: rang bzhin 'ga' zhig ni mi bden pa yin no snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that in just one cognition, some natures are true and some natures are false,

original: gcig nyid yon na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gcig nyid yon na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then “If it is one, ” etc.

original: bden pa dang mi bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par dbye ba 'di ni bden pa ma yin te blo gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bden pa dang mi bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par dbye ba 'di ni bden pa ma yin te blo gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This distinction of the characteristics of truth and falsity is not true, because it is a single cognition.

original: gcig la ni dang bzhin 'ga' zhig bden pa dang mi bden pa yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gcig la ni dang bzhin 'ga' zhig bden pa dang mi bden pa yang mi 'thad de /
translated: And it is not tenable that a single thing is both true and false.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas gcig nyid du ma 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas gcig nyid du ma 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that a single thing has properties that are mutually exclusive.

original: de nyid kyi phyir yang na gcig ma yin te blo du mar thal lo //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yang na gcig ma yin te blo du mar thal lo //
translated: And for that very reason, it is not one, because it follows that there are many cognitions.

original: brgya la khyed kyi tha snyad 'di mi bden par 'gyur te blo gcig min pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brgya la khyed kyi tha snyad 'di mi bden par 'gyur te blo gcig min pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if this convention of yours is not true, because it is not a single cognition,

original: 'on te bden pa dang mi bden pa'i yul can gyi ta snyad ni bden pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te bden pa dang mi bden pa'i yul can gyi ta snyad ni bden pa yin na /
translated: then if the convention of the object of truth and falsity is true,

original: de'i tshe du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o //🔽de'i ngo bor na cig car 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs pa'o // de'i ngo bor na cig car 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it follows that there are many.🔽Because it is impossible to apprehend them simultaneously as its nature.

original: 'di la la sogs pa'i phyir rol de'i rang bzhin ma yin na ste /
analyzed: 'di la la sogs pa'i phyir rol de'i rang bzhin ma yin na ste /
translated: If it is not their nature, then it is not one, because of the reason of the many.

original: gal te blo'i rang bzhin kho na yin na zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de'i tshe blo'i rang bzhin gyi sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa de la //
analyzed: gal te blo'i rang bzhin kho na yin na zhes bya ba'i don to // de'i tshe blo'i rang bzhin gyi sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa de la //
translated: If it is the nature of cognition, then what?🔽At that time, it is not reasonable to cognize that blue, yellow, etc., which are the nature of cognition,

original: cig car 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar rtogs pa 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: cig car 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar rtogs pa 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: in that way, characterized by simultaneous apprehension.

original: blo'i rang bzhin de yang du ma nyid kyis na cig car 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin de yang du ma nyid kyis na cig car 'dzin pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that nature of cognition, being manifold, cannot possibly apprehend simultaneously.

original: 'di la gzhan gyis brjod pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la gzhan gyis brjod pa ni ci ste zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the opponent says, Why?

original: yid 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: yid 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la /
translated: The characteristic of the mind's going, etc.

original: yid kyi sgras ni rlom par byed shes par byed ces bya ba'i bshad pas mig la sogs pa nyid la brjod do //
analyzed: yid kyi sgras ni rlom par byed shes par byed ces bya ba'i bshad pas mig la sogs pa nyid la brjod do //
translated: By the word mind, the explanation that which conceives and cognizes refers to the eyes, etc.

original: yang na mig la sogs pa mthong bas na nang gi byed pa yin 'dzin pa yang nye bar mtshon ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na mig la sogs pa mthong bas na nang gi byed pa yin 'dzin pa yang nye bar mtshon ba yin no //
translated: Or, because the eyes, etc. see, it is an internal agent, and apprehension is also indicated.

original: nges na 'bad pa chen po yod do //
analyzed: nges na 'bad pa chen po yod do //
translated: If so, there is great effort.

original: cig car 'dzin pa ni srid do zhes bya ba'o don du ma'o //
analyzed: cig car 'dzin pa ni srid do zhes bya ba'o don du ma'o //
translated: Simultaneous apprehension is possible.

original: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”

original: tshig dum bu snga ma gnyis po de nyid rim pa ji ltar ba bzhin du 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //🔽sangs rgyas pas mdzod nas mig dang snang ba dang yid de lung las 'byung @191a * //
analyzed: tshig dum bu snga ma gnyis po de nyid rim pa ji ltar ba bzhin du 'chad pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o // sangs rgyas pas mdzod nas mig dang snang ba dang yid de lung las 'byung @191a * //
translated: The first two lines of this verse explain the two lines of the root text in order.

original: ba'i dbang po dag ni ma phrad pa'i yul can ma yin no zhes ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ba'i dbang po dag ni ma phrad pa'i yul can ma yin no zhes ji skad brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: The Vaibhāṣikas say that the eye sense faculty, visible form, and eye consciousness that occur in the scriptures are not faculties that do not contact their objects.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba de ltar khas len pa na bsgribs te /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba de ltar khas len pa na bsgribs te /
translated: But if you accept that, then it is obscured.

original: yod pa las dang gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pas so //🔽'di nyid bsgrubs pa'i don du zer ba dag kyang reg par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yod pa las dang gzhan du ni zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pas so // 'di nyid bsgrubs pa'i don du zer ba dag kyang reg par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The phrase “from that which is not obscured” means from that which is not covered.🔽If you say that the eye sense faculty is the agent of seeing, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?

original: lan ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o //🔽'o na ni mar me dang chos mthun pas shin tu nye bar 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: lan ni de lta na 'o na zhes bya ba'o // 'o na ni mar me dang chos mthun pas shin tu nye bar 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”

original: 'di nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni mar me'i 'od ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni mar me'i 'od ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”🔽The answer is: “If you say that the eye sense faculty sees, then what is the function of the eye consciousness?”

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni chos gzhan no //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni chos gzhan no //
translated: “That” refers to another factor.

original: reg pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: reg pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The cause of the apprehension of contact.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa las 'od zer yod la /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa las 'od zer yod la /
translated: If light rays exist in the eye and so on,

original: de dag kyang phyis 'phros nas ldan par 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: de dag kyang phyis 'phros nas ldan par 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: and they are emitted later and then contact the object,

original: de'i tshe mun pa yang 'dzin par thal lo //
analyzed: de'i tshe mun pa yang 'dzin par thal lo //
translated: then it follows that darkness would also be apprehended.

original: shin tu thag ring ba la mgyogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu thag ring ba la mgyogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for something to be very far away and also very fast.

original: zhes sun 'byin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de la gzhan dag lan brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes sun 'byin pa brjod pa gang yin pa de la gzhan dag lan brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response of the opponent to the critique that was stated is “Well then.

original: 'bad pas brtag pa zhes bya ba ni re zhig nus pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i yid khas blang bar bya ba yin la /
analyzed: 'bad pas brtag pa zhes bya ba ni re zhig nus pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i yid khas blang bar bya ba yin la /
translated: ” The phrase “with effort” means that the mind that possesses the special ability to apprehend things quickly must be accepted.

original: de las ni mig la sogs pa rnams kyi myur ba de las ni cig car shes pa mi skye ba yin zhing /
analyzed: de las ni mig la sogs pa rnams kyi myur ba de las ni cig car shes pa mi skye ba yin zhing /
translated: From that, the eyes and so on are quick. From that, cognition does not arise simultaneously.

original: de las ni cig car snang ba 'khrul ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de las ni cig car snang ba 'khrul ba yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: From that, the appearance of simultaneity is mistaken.

original: de ltar na re zhig yid khas blangs nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig yid khas blangs nas sun 'byin pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Thus the critique is stated on the basis of accepting the mind.

original: da ni yid nyid med do zhes brjod pa ni //
analyzed: da ni yid nyid med do zhes brjod pa ni //
translated: Now, the statement “the mind itself does not exist” is

original: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “in that way.”

original: rtogs pa dang rdul phra rab kyi tshad tsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang rdul phra rab kyi tshad tsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of that is “the measure of an atom of conceptualization.”

original: 'o na yid ji 'dra ba zhig snyam na //
analyzed: 'o na yid ji 'dra ba zhig snyam na //
translated: Now, what is the mind like?

original: rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Of consciousness.”

original: yid de'i don byed pa'o //
analyzed: yid de'i don byed pa'o //
translated: The mind is the function of that.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa cig car mi skyed pa las yid dpag pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa cig car mi skyed pa las yid dpag pa ma yin nam /
translated: If the mind is not inferred from the non-simultaneous arising of consciousness,

original: des na ji ltar spong zhe na /
analyzed: des na ji ltar spong zhe na /
translated: then how is it abandoned?

original: de zhes gsungs te rnam par shes pa snga ma'i mtshan nyid kyi yid de'o //
analyzed: de zhes gsungs te rnam par shes pa snga ma'i mtshan nyid kyi yid de'o //
translated: “That” refers to the mind characterized by previous consciousness.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: “Therefore” refers to the non-simultaneous arising of consciousness.

original: rnam pa gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In another way”

original: yid byed gnyis las rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yid byed gnyis las rnam par shes pa cig car mi skye ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: refers to the establishment of the non-simultaneous arising of consciousness from the two mental activities.

original: ji ltar skam pas don de 'dzin par mthong ba de ltar rnam par shes pas ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar skam pas don de 'dzin par mthong ba de ltar rnam par shes pas ma yin no //
translated: Just as one sees the apprehension of that object by the dry eye, so it is not by consciousness.

original: rim la yod pa'i rnam pa du ma gang yin pa de dag 'dzin pa cig car skyes pas ni /
analyzed: rim la yod pa'i rnam pa du ma gang yin pa de dag 'dzin pa cig car skyes pas ni /
translated: The many aspects that exist in sequence are apprehended by the simultaneously arisen consciousness.

original: ma 'khrul pa nyid do zhes gnas so //
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa nyid do zhes gnas so //
translated: It is not mistaken.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rim pa'i rnam pa du ma dag la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rim pa'i rnam pa du ma dag la'o //
translated: There refers to the many aspects in sequence.

original: de la gzugs kyi yon @191b tan zhes bya ba ni ldan pa la'o //
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi yon @191b tan zhes bya ba ni ldan pa la'o //
translated: The good qualities of form are the qualities of the substance.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan ni 'du ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi yon tan ni 'du ba ma yin te /
translated: The good qualities of the characteristics of form are not assembled.

original: yon tan ni yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan ni yon tan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a good quality is not a good quality.

original: gal te 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it were, what would be the fault?

original: de ltar 'gyur na zhes gsungs te yon tan du na'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur na zhes gsungs te yon tan du na'o //
translated: If it were so, it would be a good quality.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rdzas kyi yon tan ni yin pa'i phyir na //
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa 'du ba can gyi rgyu ni rdzas yin no zhes bya ba'i rdzas kyi yon tan ni yin pa'i phyir na //
translated: The substance that is the cause of the assembled good qualities is substance. Because the good qualities of substance are substance,

original: nam mkha' bzhin du rdzas nyid du thal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du rdzas nyid du thal par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would follow that substance would be like space.

original: ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa yin na nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa yin na nyes pa gzhan yang brjod pa ni /
translated: If possession is a quality, another fault is stated:

original: de lta na yang zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes pa ste /
translated: Even so,

original: ldan pa rdzas yin na'o //
analyzed: ldan pa rdzas yin na'o //
translated: if possession is a substance.🔽These two,

original: 'di gnyis ni zhes bya ba ni me rtog rgyas pa'i nags zhes bya ba'i blo dang / ri mo dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i blo gnyis so //
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni zhes bya ba ni me rtog rgyas pa'i nags zhes bya ba'i blo dang / ri mo dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i blo gnyis so //
translated: the cognition of the forest in full bloom and the cognition of the possession of a painting.

original: mi mtshungs pa nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni mang po'i grangs nyid kyis bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi mtshungs pa nyid gzhung 'dzugs pa ni mang po'i grangs nyid kyis bya ba'o //
translated: The establishment of the inequality is by the very plurality of numbers.

original: grangs las tha dad pa'i nags ni khas mi len pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: grangs las tha dad pa'i nags ni khas mi len pa'i phyir na /
translated: Since a forest distinct from the number is not accepted,

original: nags kyi brjod par bya ba ni grangs mang po nyid yin no //
analyzed: nags kyi brjod par bya ba ni grangs mang po nyid yin no //
translated: the referent of the forest is the plurality of numbers.🔽In regard to what,

original: gang la zhes bya ba ni shing rnams la'o //
analyzed: gang la zhes bya ba ni shing rnams la'o //
translated: in regard to the trees.🔽Therefore,

original: des na zhes bya ba ni mang po'i grangs kyi mtshan nyid dang / me tog rgyas pa dag shing rnams la 'du ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na zhes bya ba ni mang po'i grangs kyi mtshan nyid dang / me tog rgyas pa dag shing rnams la 'du ba'i phyir ro //
translated: since the characteristic of the plurality of numbers and the full bloom of flowers are combined in the trees,

original: 'dir yang rang bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam na sna tshogs pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rang bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam na sna tshogs pa ni 'dir zhes bya ba'o //
translated: if you think that it is a nature here, the variety is here.

original: de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “It would be like that” means

original: don gcig la 'du ba'i stobs kyis nye bar btags par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba'i stobs kyis nye bar btags par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: that it would be a secondary designation by the power of inclusion in one object.

original: re zhig me la me nyid du gzung ba ni /
analyzed: re zhig me la me nyid du gzung ba ni /
translated: First, the fire is apprehended as fire.

original: phyis bram ze'i khye'u la yod pa'i chos mthun par rno ba gnyi ga yin pa gzung pa des /
analyzed: phyis bram ze'i khye'u la yod pa'i chos mthun par rno ba gnyi ga yin pa gzung pa des /
translated: Later, the sharpness that is similar to the property of the young brahmin is apprehended.

original: me'i bag chags mer rtog pa bskyed pa'i nus pa sad par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gang yin pa de ni de'i dran pas bram ze'i khye'u la yang mer sgro 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: me'i bag chags mer rtog pa bskyed pa'i nus pa sad par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gang yin pa de ni de'i dran pas bram ze'i khye'u la yang mer sgro 'dogs par byed do //
translated: By that, the latent potentialities for the conception of fire in fire are awakened. The person who has that memory also superimposes fire on the young brahmin.

original: gcig gzung ba'i dus su zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gcig gzung ba'i dus su zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “At the time of apprehending one” means

original: sngon po la sogs pa dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gzung ba gang yin pa de'i dus su'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa dag las gang yang rung ba zhig gzung ba gang yin pa de'i dus su'o //
translated: at the time of apprehending any one of the blue and so on.

original: bzung bzhin pa la zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba mdun na gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: bzung bzhin pa la zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba mdun na gnas pa la'o //
translated: “While apprehending” means while any one is present in front.

original: rnam 'grel phyis 'chad par 'gyur pas re zhig rang nyid kyis brjod pa ni //
analyzed: rnam 'grel phyis 'chad par 'gyur pas re zhig rang nyid kyis brjod pa ni //
translated: Since the commentary on the Commentary on Valid Knowledge will be explained later, for now I will state it myself.

original: de la ni zhes bram ze'i khye'u dag la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zhes bram ze'i khye'u dag la'o //
translated: “In that” refers to the young brahmins.

original: 'on te nye bas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'on te nye bas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or is it because of proximity?

original: nye bar ni lhag par nye ba ste /
analyzed: nye bar ni lhag par nye ba ste /
translated: Proximity means being very close.

original: gang la sngon po yod pa de nyid las ser po nye bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gang la sngon po yod pa de nyid las ser po nye bar gnas pa ste /
translated: If blue is present, yellow is located very close to it.

original: de ltar nye bar sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba yin na lan ni nye bar gnas pa'i 'dzin pa de ni zhes bya ba ste /🔽dang po gcig la mthong ba phyis gzhan mthong ba na gzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nye bar sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ba yin na lan ni nye bar gnas pa'i 'dzin pa de ni zhes bya ba ste / dang po gcig la mthong ba phyis gzhan mthong ba na gzung ba ma yin no //
translated: If it were to be superimposed in this way, the response is: the apprehension of that which is located nearby.
When one first sees one thing and later sees another, it is not apprehended.🔽The object is the object of blue.

original: der zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i yul du ser po gzung ba'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes 'brel te lan ni yul der zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni sngon po'i yul du ser po gzung ba'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa yin no zhes 'brel te lan ni yul der zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The response is: in that object.

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni sgro btags pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni sgro btags pa'o //
translated: That itself is the superimposition.

original: 'on te zhes bya ba la sngar mthong ba'i sngon po la sogs pa dran par bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te zhes bya ba la sngar mthong ba'i sngon po la sogs pa dran par bya ba ni /
translated: Or, the blue that was seen previously is what is to be remembered.

original: ser po 'dzin pa'i dus na gzung bar bya ba nyid du snang ba yin no //
analyzed: ser po 'dzin pa'i dus na gzung bar bya ba nyid du snang ba yin no //
translated: At the time of apprehending yellow, it appears as if it were to be apprehended.
