analyzed: de lta yin na zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says, “In that case . . . ”

original: dran pa'i rnam pas zhes bya ba ni dran par byas so //
analyzed: dran pa'i rnam pas zhes bya ba ni dran par byas so //
translated: By the aspect of memory means by the act of remembering.

original: ma rtogs pa ni nyams su ma myong ba'o //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni nyams su ma myong ba'o //
translated: Not understood means not experienced.

original: snga ma nyid kyang mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa kho nas rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: snga ma nyid kyang mngon du byed pa'i rnam pa kho nas rtogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that the former is understood only by the aspect of actualization,

original: mngon sum du zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mngon sum du zhes gsungs so //
translated: he says, “In perception . . . ”

original: don rnams kyis gzhan de sngon po'am ser po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa nyid dam cig shos gzhan ma yin pa na'o //
analyzed: don rnams kyis gzhan de sngon po'am ser po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin tha dad pa nyid dam cig shos gzhan ma yin pa na'o //
translated: By the objects means by the other, which is either of a different nature, such as blue or yellow, or not different.

original: rtogs pa la ltos te grub pa ma yin pa'i tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa la ltos te grub pa ma yin pa'i tha dad pa'o //
translated: The difference is not established in relation to the understanding.

original: grub pa'i mtha' pas brjod pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' pas brjod pa ni 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The master of the Abhidharma says, “This . . . ”

original: tha dad pa'i tha snyad med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i tha snyad med par 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The expression “it would be impossible to make the distinction” means that it would be impossible to make the distinction in terms of conventional expressions.

original: gzhan gyis mi mtshungs te zhes smras so //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi mtshungs te zhes smras so //
translated: The opponent’s response is “It is not similar to that.”

original: de don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba don du gnyer ba'o //
analyzed: de don du gnyer ba zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba don du gnyer ba'o //
translated: “ Seeking it” means seeking to obtain it.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o //
translated: “ This” refers to the engagement.

original: de zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'o //🔽shes na zhes bya ba @203a * //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'o // shes na zhes bya ba @203a * //
translated: “ That” refers to the object of attainment.

original: ni mngon du byed pa'i shes pas nyams su myong ba na'o //
analyzed: ni mngon du byed pa'i shes pas nyams su myong ba na'o //
translated: “ If it is known” means if it is experienced by the knowledge that perceives it.

original: 'jug pas kyang de'i yul can mngon du byed pa'i shes pa skyed pa nyid thob pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pas kyang de'i yul can mngon du byed pa'i shes pa skyed pa nyid thob pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The engagement also generates the knowledge that perceives it, which has that as its object. That is the attainment, not anything else.

original: gal te dang po skyes na de'i tshe ci'i don du 'jug par byed /🔽mo gsham gyi bu la zhes bya ba mngon du ma byas par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te dang po skyes na de'i tshe ci'i don du 'jug par byed / mo gsham gyi bu la zhes bya ba mngon du ma byas par khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is generated at the beginning, then for what purpose is there engagement?🔽Because there is no difference between the non-perceived and the perceived in the case of the son of a barren woman.

original: mo gsham gyi bu de de med pa'i phyir dang thob par bya ba 'di ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu de de med pa'i phyir dang thob par bya ba 'di ni yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the son of a barren woman does not exist, and this object of attainment does exist.

original: 'di kho na la 'jug gi mo gsham gyi bu la ni ma yin pa la brjod pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di kho na la 'jug gi mo gsham gyi bu la ni ma yin pa la brjod pa ni de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: It is only in relation to this that the term “that itself” is used, not in relation to the son of a barren woman.🔽If the cognition that perceives it does not exist, how can one know that the object to be attained exists and the son of a barren woman does not?

original: mngon du byed pa'i shes pa med na thob par bya ba ni yod la mo gsham gyi bu nyid med do zhes bya ba 'di nyid ji ltar shes de ltar na mthong ba la sogs pa las yod pa yin no zhes shes pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mngon du byed pa'i shes pa med na thob par bya ba ni yod la mo gsham gyi bu nyid med do zhes bya ba 'di nyid ji ltar shes de ltar na mthong ba la sogs pa las yod pa yin no zhes shes pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Thus, it is known to exist through seeing and so on.

original: reg pa la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: reg pa la sogs pa zhes gsungs so //
translated: The root text says, “Contact and so on.”

original: rig pa med pa ni rig pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa med pa ni rig pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The phrase “without awareness” means without the existence of awareness.

original: rig ce na zhes bya ba ni mngon du byas she na'o //
analyzed: rig ce na zhes bya ba ni mngon du byas she na'o //
translated: The phrase “if it is known” means if it is perceived.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni 'o na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “in this case” refers to the case just mentioned.

original: 'jug pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa ni yod zin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed pa ni yod zin pa'i phyir ro zhes dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intended meaning is that the result of engagement is already present.

original: de'i phyir khyad par la tha dad pa rig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par la tha dad pa rig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the difference is that awareness is known.

original: de'i tshe khyad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe khyad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, because the difference is not understood,

original: ji ltar khyad par las 'jug par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar khyad par las 'jug par 'gyur /
translated: how can one engage in the difference?

original: gal te spyi khyad par las tha mi dad pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te spyi khyad par las tha mi dad pa yin na /
translated: If the universal is not different from the particular,🔽then when the universal is perceived, the particular is also perceived.🔽What is the point of engaging in it?

original: spyi de mngon du byas pa na khyad par yang mngon sum du byas pas ni ci'i don du 'jug / spyi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa khas len na ni ji ltar de rang bzhin gang gis spyi tha dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni rtogs su
analyzed: spyi de mngon du byas pa na khyad par yang mngon sum du byas pas ni ci'i don du 'jug / spyi tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa khas len na ni ji ltar de rang bzhin gang gis spyi tha dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni rtogs su
translated: If one accepts that the universal is different or not different, then by whatever nature the universal is different,

original: zin kyang khyad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: zin kyang khyad par ma rtogs pa'i phyir na /
translated: even though it is understood, the particular is not understood.

original: khyad par tha mi dad pa de la mi 'jug pa kho na'o //
analyzed: khyad par tha mi dad pa de la mi 'jug pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is only not engaged in.🔽By whatever nature the universal is not different,

original: ji ltar de rang bzhin gang gis spyi tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni spyi rtogs pa na /
analyzed: ji ltar de rang bzhin gang gis spyi tha mi dad pa'i rang bzhin des ni spyi rtogs pa na /
translated: when the universal is understood, the particular is also understood.

original: khyad par yang rtogs pa'i phyir thob zin pas des zhugs pa la don ci yod /
analyzed: khyad par yang rtogs pa'i phyir thob zin pas des zhugs pa la don ci yod /
translated: Since it is already obtained, what is the point of engaging in it?

original: ci mngon sum las 'jug pa mthong ngam 'on te rjes su dpag pa las phyogs dang po la re zhig brjod pa ni /
analyzed: ci mngon sum las 'jug pa mthong ngam 'on te rjes su dpag pa las phyogs dang po la re zhig brjod pa ni /
translated: Is engagement seen from direct perception or from inference?

original: rang don rig phyir zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rang don rig phyir zhes gsungs te /
translated: With regard to the first possibility, it is said, “Because it is known for one’s own benefit.”

original: rang gi yul gyi rang bzhin tsam zhig mthong ba'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rang gi yul gyi rang bzhin tsam zhig mthong ba'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because it sees only the nature of its own object.

original: /'on te 'jug pa'i yang rang gi yul gyi rang bzhin nyid min na des na de yang mngon sum gyis rig pa yin no snyam na /
analyzed: /'on te 'jug pa'i yang rang gi yul gyi rang bzhin nyid min na des na de yang mngon sum gyis rig pa yin no snyam na /
translated: But if the engaging consciousness does not see the nature of its own object, then it is not a direct perception.

original: 'jug pa snga phyi'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'jug pa snga phyi'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: The response to that is: “The prior and subsequent . . .”

original: de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin la'o //
translated: “That” refers to the prior and subsequent natures.

original: de'i phyir phyi'i don la yang rnam pa thams cad du yang 'jug pa'i 'thad pa @203b yin pa'i phyir na ;
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi'i don la yang rnam pa thams cad du yang 'jug pa'i 'thad pa @203b yin pa'i phyir na ;
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that external objects are engaged in any way.

original: pha rol pos bdag cag la gnyis pa la yang ji ltar 'jug ba srid ces bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtsod pa gang yin de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: pha rol pos bdag cag la gnyis pa la yang ji ltar 'jug ba srid ces bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtsod pa gang yin de gsal ba yin no //
translated: The opponent’s objection is: “How is it possible that the second consciousness engages its object?”

original: 'di ji ltar gsal snyam na don 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ji ltar gsal snyam na don 'di ni zhes bya ba ste /
translated: How is this clarified? “This is not established for us.”

original: 'di ni gzhan yin la bdag ni gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan yin la bdag ni gzhan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This means that the meaning of “this is different and I am not different” is not established for both ourselves and others.

original: don 'di rang bzhin la grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid gang las grub snyam na 'di ltar skye ba grub pa ni rang rig pa nyid yin gyi zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: don 'di rang bzhin la grub pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid gang las grub snyam na 'di ltar skye ba grub pa ni rang rig pa nyid yin gyi zhes gsungs so //
translated: But if one asks, On what basis is this established, that this object is not established in reality? [the answer is:] in this way, the establishment of the arising is reflexive awareness itself.

original: 'dri bar byed pa bdag dang 'chad par byed pa gzhan 'di zhes de ltar rnam pa 'dis rgol ba gnyig yang rang gi rna par nye bar bsgyur ba'i shes pa rig ba nyid dper na rmi lam gyis rtogs pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i rnam ba yin
analyzed: 'dri bar byed pa bdag dang 'chad par byed pa gzhan 'di zhes de ltar rnam pa 'dis rgol ba gnyig yang rang gi rna par nye bar bsgyur ba'i shes pa rig ba nyid dper na rmi lam gyis rtogs pa rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i rnam ba yin
translated: The one who asks and the other who explains, this, in this way, the two opponents are only aware of the cognition that is turned inward, just as in a dream, in the form of the opponent and the respondent.

original: gyi rtogs pas nye bar bsgyur ba rig pa tsam yin ba bzhin te don dam par ni rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gyi rtogs pas nye bar bsgyur ba rig pa tsam yin ba bzhin te don dam par ni rnam par dbye ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But in reality, there is no distinction.

original: smyon pa'i rtogs pas yang mgyogs 'gro la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa rig ba tsam yin gyi /
analyzed: smyon pa'i rtogs pas yang mgyogs 'gro la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi rtogs pa rig ba tsam yin gyi /
translated: Also, the cognition of a madman, which has the form of a horse and so on, is only awareness.

original: mgyogs 'gro la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnam par dbye ba ni yod pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mgyogs 'gro la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnam par dbye ba ni yod pa ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: The distinction of the form of a horse and so on does not exist.

original: 'o na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
analyzed: 'o na ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas dogs pa bsu nas brjod pa ni 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o ;
translated: “Well then, etc.” anticipates an objection. “ This” etc. is the response.

original: / gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol bas so //
analyzed: / gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol bas so //
translated: “ By another” is by an opponent.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni ci zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni ci zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ What is said here” is “what.”

original: ji ltar byed pa ma mthong snyam na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar byed pa ma mthong snyam na ji ltar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ How can one not see the activity?” is “how.”

original: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa'o //
translated: “ Well then, how?” is the intention.

original: grub pa'i mtha' ni khyed kyis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' ni khyed kyis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The conclusion is “you” etc.

original: gal te du ba la sogs pa me la sogs pa la yod par mngon sum gyis dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam snyam na /
analyzed: gal te du ba la sogs pa me la sogs pa la yod par mngon sum gyis dmigs pa nyid ma yin nam snyam na /
translated: If you think, “Isn’t it just by direct perception that smoke etc. is seen to exist in fire etc.?”

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i zhes gsungs so //
translated: “ The cause and effect” is stated.

original: don ni 'di yin te re zhig rig pa bdag nyid ni ldog pa nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don ni 'di yin te re zhig rig pa bdag nyid ni ldog pa nyams su myong ba ma yin te /
translated: The point is this. First, the awareness itself does not experience the cessation,

original: ldog pa'i dus na rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ldog pa'i dus na rang nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at the time of cessation it does not exist itself.

original: rig pa gzhan gyis byang spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: rig pa gzhan gyis byang spyod yul du mi 'gyur ba nyid du'o //
translated: Nor does another awareness make it an object of experience.

original: des kyang de med par ji ltar 'dzin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: des kyang de med par ji ltar 'dzin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How could it apprehend it as nonexistent?

original: ce ste res 'ga' ba nyid du yang yod pa khyod kyis rtogs sam zhes 'brel to //
analyzed: ce ste res 'ga' ba nyid du yang yod pa khyod kyis rtogs sam zhes 'brel to //
translated: If you think that it exists sometimes, then what is the point of your question?

original: 'o na slob dpon gyis de ji ltar bshad snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na slob dpon gyis de ji ltar bshad snyam na /
translated: But how is it that the Master has explained it in that way?

original: tha dad par smra ba la zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tha dad par smra ba la zhes gsungs so //
translated: He says, “To the proponents of difference.”

original: 'dir sna tshogs gnyis med 'di ni tshig re re la yang log par rtogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang 'brel ba yin mod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir sna tshogs gnyis med 'di ni tshig re re la yang log par rtogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang 'brel ba yin mod kyi /
translated: Here, this non-difference of the manifold is indeed connected with hundreds of false views in each verse,

original: gzhung mangs kyis 'jigs pas na bdag cag gis ma bkod do //
analyzed: gzhung mangs kyis 'jigs pas na bdag cag gis ma bkod do //
translated: but fearing too lengthy a text, I have not set them forth.

original: de'i phyed la sogs par zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i phyed la sogs par zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Half of that, etc.”

original: @204a * // sngar mthong ba gang yin pa de'i phyed dam cung zad ma rdzogs par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @204a * // sngar mthong ba gang yin pa de'i phyed dam cung zad ma rdzogs par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means “half of what was seen before, or a little less than that.”

original: sems min zhes bya ba'i phyi rol ba'o //
analyzed: sems min zhes bya ba'i phyi rol ba'o //
translated: “It is not the mind” is the opponent’s view.

original: gal te dngos po ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de de lta bu kho nar skyes pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te dngos po ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de de lta bu kho nar skyes pa yin na /
translated: If the object is produced just as it is seen,

original: de'i tshe lkog tu gyur pa nyid dang gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba nyid du yang ma mthong ba des na rtog pa nyid dam /
analyzed: de'i tshe lkog tu gyur pa nyid dang gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba nyid du yang ma mthong ba des na rtog pa nyid dam /
translated: At that time, since it is not seen as hidden or as something seen by another, it is not conceptual.

original: gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba nyid du ma skyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba nyid du ma skyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, since it is not seen as hidden or as seen by another, it does not arise as an idea or as seen by another.

original: skyes pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes pa yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not arisen,

original: de lta ma yin na phyi rol nyid nyams par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na phyi rol nyid nyams par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs pa'o //
translated: otherwise, it would be external.

original: phyogs nyid la gnod par byed pa gzhan brjod pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs nyid la gnod par byed pa gzhan brjod pa ni /
translated: Another objection to the position is stated:

original: rgyu gzhan gyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan gyis ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By another cause.

original: yang ji ltar na lkog tu gyur pa nyid dang gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba dngos po ma skyes she na dngos po ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: yang ji ltar na lkog tu gyur pa nyid dang gzhan gyis blta bar bya ba dngos po ma skyes she na dngos po ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: How is it that hiddenness and being seen by another are not arisen? He says: A thing.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa gnyis 'grel pa ni /
translated: The commentary on the two verses is:

original: rgyu gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By another cause.

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni shes pa bzhin du'o //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni shes pa bzhin du'o //
translated: Like the aspect of the apprehender means like consciousness.

original: don kho na'o zhes bya ba ni shes pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: don kho na'o zhes bya ba ni shes pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Only the object means not consciousness.

original: re zhig bde ba la sogs pa ni dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ne pa las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: re zhig bde ba la sogs pa ni dmigs par bya ba'i rang bzhin yin yang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no zhes brjod pa ni ne pa las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “The object of awareness is of the nature of pleasure, etc., but is not of the nature of consciousness” is the opinion of the Naiyāyikas.

original: gal te de yang don gyi rang bzhin yin na de'i tshe sngon po la sogs pa bzhin gzhan gyis ci ste dmigs she na /
analyzed: gal te de yang don gyi rang bzhin yin na de'i tshe sngon po la sogs pa bzhin gzhan gyis ci ste dmigs she na /
translated: If it is of the nature of an object, then, like blue, etc., why is it not perceived by another?

original: nang gi zhes smos te nang yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyis dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi zhes smos te nang yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyis dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The word “internal” is used because it is internal, it is not perceived by another.

original: gzhan dag shes pa grub par bya ba'i don du tshad ma nye bar 'god pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag shes pa grub par bya ba'i don du tshad ma nye bar 'god pa ni gang gis zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Others, in order to prove consciousness, state the means of valid cognition: “By what is it known that it is internal?”

original: 'di la brjod pa ni de yang min zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni de yang min zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reply to this is “That is not so.”

original: gang gi tshe shes pa zhes bya ba med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes pa zhes bya ba med pa de'i tshe /
translated: When there is no so-called consciousness,

original: dmigs par bya ba rang nyid rig pa yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba rang nyid rig pa yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the object of awareness would be self-aware.
